message.body: ###### tells me you might be interested but I question the seriousness if it... Going to see breaking dawn tonight. Interested?
Ha ha. I would like to see you, but not see that ;-)
That's what I thought and why I didn't extend the invite in the first place
See you at #####'s tomorrow though, right?
But if you want to come east frozen indian food (its really good) and hang out in my garage studio till 9 you're welcome to
Yes I will be at the non tuesday ###########.
Oooh, if you're sure, I would love to. I have some stuff to do for now- would 7 be ok?
Sure. I'll be in the garage so you can just pull your car down the driveway
Great! Want me to bring anything?
Nah. I just got back from the indian grocer so I think I'm all set.
